title.rendered: Africa Healthcare Nursing College (PTY) LTD Online Registration 2025

content.rendered:
How to register online for Africa Healthcare Nursing College (PTY) LTD 2025 – Africa Healthcare Nursing College (PTY) LTD Undergraduate and Postgraduate Online Registration 2025

 

An online admission application and registration form/dates for the 2025 academic year have been released by the Africa Healthcare Nursing College (PTY) LTD management.

Africa Healthcare Nursing College (PTY) LTD is accepting online applications for;

  • First-time applicants to Africa Healthcare Nursing College (PTY) LTD
  • New qualifications and/or specializations for students
  • Candidates who applied for admission but were not offered a space or who were offered a space and took it but did not register
  • A student who completes a higher certificate or any other programme and wishes to continue with further undergraduate studies

How to Register for Africa Healthcare Nursing College (PTY) LTD Online 2025

For Africa Healthcare Nursing College (PTY) LTD Online Registration, you will need the following items:

  • A valid email account
  • The South Africa identification number
  • Students from abroad need a passport

Please CLICK HERE to register for Africa Healthcare Nursing College (PTY) LTD 2025

 

see also Netcare Education Durban Online Registration 2025
